title: 98/596/EC: Commission Decision of 14 October 1998 amending Council Decision 97/602/EC concerning the list referred to in the second subparagraph of Article 3(1) of Regulation (EEC) No 3254/91 and in Article 1(1)(a) of Commission Regulation (EC) No 35/97 (notified under document number C(1998) 3064)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 14 October 1998 amending Council Decision 97/602/EC concerning the list referred to in the second subparagraph of Article 3(1) of Regulation (EEC) No 3254/91 and in Article 1(1)(a) of Commission Regulation (EC) No 35/97 (notified under document number C(1998) 3064) (98/596/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The Annex to Council Decision 97/602/EC is hereby replaced by the Annex to this Decision.
This Decision shall enter into force on the 20th day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 14 October 1998.
For the Commission
Ritt BJERREGAARD
Member of the Commission
